attributes.action: The undersigned believe that, given that most of the former work of the two Houses of Parliament is now done by the institutions of the European Union (conservative estimates put it at around 80% of legislation is now transposed from the EU), the salaries of sitting MPs should be cut in relation to the work that they do.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the government's ability to pass laws due to the European overarching control of this country, coupled wth their blind following of the EU it is not right they should continue to be paid the sums they are. At this time some 70% of legislation originates in Brussels.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
